key_risk_themes: ["Distributed Systems Complexity (Async Processing, State Propagation)","Operational Readiness and Observability","External Dependency Management"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize implementation of the Transactional Outbox pattern for the bulk CSV import worker (RISK-002).","Mandate and enforce the integration of OpenTelemetry for all background workers to ensure debuggability (RISK-007).","Conduct a formal team skills assessment and schedule targeted training for critical technologies like EKS and OpenTelemetry (RISK-004)."]
